definitions.definition: a fault or problem in something or someone that spoils that thing or person or causes it, him, or her not to work correctly:
examples: All the company's aircraft have been grounded, after a defect in the engine cooling system was discovered.

definitions.definition: a physical condition in which something is wrong with a part of someone's body:
examples: She suffers from a heart/sight/speech defect.

definitions.definition: to leave a country, political party, etc., especially in order to join an opposing one:
examples: When the national hockey team visited the US, half the players defected.
